title: Azure AI Agent Operational Metrics
description: Standard Azure AI Agent Operational Metrics

prerequisites.messageMarkdown: This metric is supposed to be used with [Azure AI Agent service](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/agents/overview). [Tracing](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/agents/concepts/tracing) should also be enabled through AI foundary portal.
`TargetingId` must be associated with your GenAI spans that are being evaluated. See [link to MSlearn doc]() for more details.
